Header.title: What is your lucky number ?!
Header.paragraph: The owners of our NFT series Fancy Numbers will receive a unique number on the blockchain. With this number you can win our exlusive pot, get on whitelists in other NFT porjects or burn the Number and get money back.

About.paragraph: The Fancy Numbers NFT collection consists of 1000 unique numbers. All Fancy Number NFTs has a outstanding design with a number from 1 - 1000 on it. Every 2 days a Fancy Number is sold at our auction and the pot keeps growing. Once the pot reaces the amount of 100.000 doller we will announce the date of the raffel. Only owner of an Fancy Number NFT can parcticipate in the draw. After the raffel the auctions will go on till the pot reaches again 100 k and so on. So the sooner you get a Fancy Number the higher are the chances to win.

Features.title: NFT auction
Features.text: Every 2 days an NFT is offered on the auction with a starting price of 0.05 ETH. 75% of the sales go into the winning pot.

Features.title: Win a big pot of money
Features.text: Once the pot reaches a value of at least 100,000 dollars, preparations will be made for the raffle.

Features.title: Burn your Number
Features.text: Fancy Numbers Owner can burn their NFTs and reseave 50% of the sale price.

Features.title: Opensea fee
Features.text: 50% of the traiding fee of opensea will be added to the pot
